Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Carbonate \Car"bon*ate\, n. [Cf. F. carbonate.] (Chem.) A salt or carbonic acid, as in limestone, some forms of lead ore, etc. [1913 Webster]
carbonate n : a salt or ester of carbonic acid (containing the anion CO3) v 1: treat with carbon dioxide; "Carbonated soft drinks" 2: turn into a carbonate
